channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Windows 10 Version 2004 for x64-based Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Windows 10 Version 2004 for x64-based Systems

item.title: CVE-2020-1271|2024-08-04T06:31:59.980Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows Backup Service improperly handles file operations.To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker would first have to gain execution on the victim system, aka 'Windows Backup Service Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1278|2024-08-04T06:31:59.791Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Service improperly handles file operations, aka 'Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1257, CVE-2020-1293.

item.title: CVE-2020-1423|2024-08-04T06:39:10.302Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in the way that the Windows Subsystem for Linux handles files, aka 'Windows Subsystem for Linux Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1294|2024-08-04T06:32:00.620Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in the way that the Windows WalletService handles objects in memory, aka 'Windows WalletService Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1287.

item.title: CVE-2020-1275|2024-08-04T06:31:59.682Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows kernel fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Windows Kernel Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0986, CVE-2020-1237, CVE-2020-1246, CVE-2020-1262, CVE-2020-1264, CVE-2020-1266, CVE-2020-1269, CVE-2020-1273, CVE-2020-1274, CVE-2020-1276, CVE-2020-1307, CVE-2020-1316.

item.title: CVE-2020-1364|2024-08-04T06:32:00.904Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the way that the WalletService handles files, aka 'Windows WalletService Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1269|2024-08-04T06:31:59.983Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows kernel fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Windows Kernel Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0986, CVE-2020-1237, CVE-2020-1246, CVE-2020-1262, CVE-2020-1264, CVE-2020-1266, CVE-2020-1273, CVE-2020-1274, CVE-2020-1275, CVE-2020-1276, CVE-2020-1307, CVE-2020-1316.

item.title: CVE-2020-1405|2024-08-04T06:32:00.949Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Windows Mobile Device Management (MDM) Diagnostics improperly handles junctions, aka 'Windows Mobile Device Management Diagnostics Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1372.

item.title: CVE-2020-1425|2024-08-04T06:39:10.299Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: A remoted code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Windows Codecs Library handles objects in memory, aka 'Microsoft Windows Codecs Library Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1457.

item.title: CVE-2020-1284|2024-08-04T06:31:59.956Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the way that the Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) protocol handles certain requests, aka 'Windows SMBv3 Client/Server Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1204|2024-08-04T06:31:58.229Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Windows Mobile Device Management (MDM) Diagnostics improperly handles junctions, aka 'Windows Mobile Device Management Diagnostics Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1262|2024-08-04T06:32:00.286Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows kernel fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Windows Kernel Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0986, CVE-2020-1237, CVE-2020-1246, CVE-2020-1264, CVE-2020-1266, CVE-2020-1269, CVE-2020-1273, CVE-2020-1274, CVE-2020-1275, CVE-2020-1276, CVE-2020-1307, CVE-2020-1316.
